title: Haven't been getting my chest even though I get S- and above
body: I have been playing league for a few days and I have chest to gain, but every time I get an S- or above it won't give me the chest. Keys aren't my issue but the chest haven't been given to me at all and this is killing my patience. I do not want to put my time and effort in trying to get something I already need to be getting after it's available and I am tired of this. First my loot page wouldn't load and the latest patch fixed it but now the chest aren't being given to me. Why??? This is annoying.

replies.body: I keep forgetting about the champ per season thing -.- my bad
One chest per champ per season is the maximum you can get.

It looks like the champion you most recently got an S on was with Vi, which you had already received a chest for. Other than that, I'm not seeing any other S's with the second most recent being back in June with Rakan.

Are you making sure you are playing champs that you have not previously unlocked chests on? You can only unlock a chest per champ once.
You can check by going to your collection page and checking your champions. Anything with a border around them means you have unlocked a chest on them champions.

You also cannot get chests from champions who are on free rotation who you do not own.
